welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marshfield, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport houses all domestic and international flights, as well as various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive travel experience.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines, including Air Canada, United Airlines, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines, including Aer Lingus, Alaska Airlines, and British Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights for various airlines, including Emirates, Lufthansa, and Qatar Airways.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Provincetown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Provincetown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
